drupalNodeEvent.title: Picturing West Lake: The Poetics and Representation of an Iconic Place

field_organizers.processed: Princeton University East Asian Studies Program and the Tang Center for East Asian Art

field_description.processed: Picturing West Lake explores how a pictorial tradition in the representation of an iconic place was emplaced, fashioned, refashioned, transmuted and transmitted over time to convey cultural value, historical memory, political ideology, and artistic expression.
